articles.description: Ibrahimovic and Lukaku were booked by referee Paolo Valeri after clashing towards the end of the first-half - and both are now banned for their next respective Coppa Italia clash.
articles.content:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Romelu Lukaku have both received one-match bans following their heated confrontation in the Milan derby on Tuesday.

articles.author: Alex Milne
articles.title: Anthony Martial's wife reveals death threat messages after Man Utd's midweek defeat - Mirror Online
articles.description: The French forward was heavily criticised for his performance during his side's 2-1 defeat to Sheffield United
articles.content:
Anthony Martial's wife Melanie has shared a series of vile messages she received in the wake of Manchester United's 2-1 defeat to Sheffield United on Wednesday.

articles.author: Theo Squires
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp should break his own transfer rule to solve Liverpool defensive crisis - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: One of Jurgen Klopp's former Dortmund stars is a free agent right now and could be exactly what the manager needs in the short term at Liverpool
articles.content:
Liverpool need a centre-back.
Jurgen Klopp knows it, the fans know it and the media know it. FSG surely know it too.

articles.author: Kathryn Batte
articles.title: Manchester United 'offered the chance to sign former Man City striker Edin Dzeko' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The striker was left out of the Serie A side's 4-3 victory over Spezia on Saturday and is now training on his own after a fall-out with manager Paulo Fonseca.
articles.content:
Manchester United have reportedly been offered the chance to sign Roma striker and former Man City star Edin Dzeko.
